UI: Content Card

Comparison Card

The Comparison Card displays feature comparisons, vs. tables, and product comparisons. Features items being compared, comparison criteria, feature matrix, winner/recommendation, pros/cons lists, and scoring system. Uses Schema.org/ItemList markup.
